title: Argumentative Writing and Persuasive Techniques

vocab.definition: A claim supported by reasons and evidence
Facts, examples, or expert opinions that support a claim
An opposing viewpoint to your main argument
Trying to convince someone to agree with your point of view
A reliable and trustworthy source of information

teachingNotes: Teach the structure of argumentative essays. Emphasize the importance of using credible evidence and addressing counterarguments.

sample.question: What is a claim supported by reasons and evidence?
